text: It is a new year from today. Cherry blossoms at the official residence are in full bloom soon. I also look forward to work newly. At the beginning of the fiscal year, we set up three pillars as a policy of the Cabinet. "Open the Officer", "Open the Country", "Open the Future". I wrote in the mail magazine in detail, so please have a look. http://bit.ly/bJ8buK
To all Christian believers in the Republic of Croatia I warmly congratulate Easter! http://bit.ly/cxNyVH

We met with His Majesty the King Abdullah and Jordan, and we were able to exchange fruitful opinions including cooperation on Middle East peace and nuclear power generation. The king was a Japanese fan and he was enjoying a bike trip by taking a Harley Davidson in Kyushu before he got here, he said yesterday that he was donated at the peace park of Nagasaki.

I visited Shiga Prefecture and learned the necessity and difficulty of integration at "Kindergarden" which promotes integrated operation of kindergarten and nursery school. In addition, I heard stories about recycling resources by rape flowers, people working on the natural regeneration of Lake Biwa and surveying fish, and photovoltaic panel manufacturing sites. I strongly felt that I could not lose Japan to Shiga in the most environmentally advanced prefecture.
It is the second real dove cafe from now on. Today it is food and agriculture cafe, starting from the barbecue in the garden at the official residence.
Wishing you all a happy Passover !! Best Wishes for a Happy Passover http://bit.ly/9nsXuH

The 2nd real pigeon cafe is over. Today, I was able to hear valuable opinions about the problems of agriculture, dairy farming, food and drink industry sites. I wrote it on the blog, so please have a look. http://bit.ly/a4dh1g

Naoko Yamazaki will fly to space by Discovery. Mr. Yoshizaki's International Space Station is headed by Mr. Souichi Noguchi, so two Japanese people stay at the same time. It is a very valuable opportunity. I also expect the activities of both of you as an "alien".

The agreement between the United States and Russia is an important step on the road to a world without nuclear weapons http://bit.ly/cMmoRK

Yesterday, the US - Russia - Leaders signed a new nuclear disarmament treaty in Prague. We welcome you a lot. Japan is the only atomic bomb victim. I myself am going ahead and heading toward the realization of a world without nuclear weapons. From Monday it is the nuclear security summit in Washington.
is in Mexico. Looking forward to meeting on climate with President Calderon later today.
going to visit rainforest in chiappas today. Stopping deforestation is one of the cheapest and easiest measures we have for rapid cuts in CO2 emissions.

Last night I was chased by the response to the crash of the President of Poland, the situation in Thailand which is tense. Did the President's strong thought on the memorial ceremony of "Kachin no Mori incident" lead to this tragedy? Again, I would like to express my deep appreciation to the people who died, including President of Poland.

Last Friday I relayed the "New Public" roundtable for the first time on Ustream. Thank you for many reactions at Twitter. We will continue to work on openness from now on.

At the round table meeting on Friday, we got a lot of meaningful proposals, including the idea of ​​"Wasabi Kimu", which proposes to introduce a part of the voucher method when fully implementing child allowance. Directed a 50% tax deduction (upper limit is 1/4 of total tax payment such as income tax) of individual donation to NPO, school, welfare facility etc. I think this is also a big step.

President Obama will depart for Washington in order to attend the nuclear security summit aimed at preventing nuclear terrorism. It is a bullet business trip of 3 days a night. We will do our utmost to "the world without nuclear weapons."
It is Washington now. After meeting with Mr. Hu Jintao, I attended the nuclear security summit. From me, I made four proposals to be at the forefront of nuclear abolition. http://bit.ly/a1FzJK
